overview:
Chris Rothwell is an online marketing professional with over seven years in search engine marketing focusing on SEM, SEO, PPC, social media, local search, analytics and more. Chris began his career as a graphic and web designer after receiving a BA in Multimedia at California Lutheran University, but found niche in the online marketing world shortly after graduation.

Previously, Chris has managed ~$100 million in advertising spend on award winning campaigns and accounts. Experience with both large and small clients, including Adobe, Research In Motion and more. International work experience, managing clients in Europe, while working out of London, UK.

Awards & Certificates include: 2009 Gartner & 1to1 Customer Awards: Marketing Optimization - RIM - Gold 2010 OMMA Search Marketing: SEM Campaign - Adobe CS5 Global Launch - Gold 2010 IAB MIXX Award: Search Marketing Campaign - Adobe Connect - Gold Google AdWords Certified Professional
